item.title: popol
item.description: × POPOL HD Wallpaper ❮ ❯ POPOL MOBILE LEGENDS Role: Marksman Lane: Gold Lane Tier : A Tier BP : 32000 DM : 599 Ticket : 0 popol × @ Close More Info Hero skills Popol Skills 1 × We Are Friends Popol always fights side by side with his best partner, Kupa. Popol takes good care of Kupa. If Kupa hasn't taken any damage in 5s, 10% of its max HP will be restored each second.
